ygData.subject: Maximal Iron Squad
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: This is the Maximal group I was talking about. Whatever happens, they re leaving on sunday. BIC: Over a distant colony planet, the small space station

OOC: This is the Maximal group I was talking about. Whatever happens, 
they're leaving on sunday.

BIC:

Over a distant colony planet, the small space station burned its way 
to orbit. The message was relayed as soon as it was in range.

Sitting in a large chair on the bridge, the large bot that seemed 
covered with spikes was massaging his forehead, eyes closed.

Yggdrasil Prime: Man, Talos, what have ya gotten into this time?

He spoke of his younger cousin that had ventured after Megatron.

He had just been ordered to go and get him back to Cybertron.
Or to pick up what was left of the Maximal crew.

He activated the commline to the planet.

Yggdrasil Prime: Botanica, you there? Yggie on the line.

Botanica: Yes, I read you. What is it?

Yggdrasil: Just received new orders. Maximal Iron Squad has to leave 
really soon. Get them for me, please.

Botanica: Yes, sir. What about the scientist group I lead?

Yggdrasil: Take only orders that come from Cybertron. It'll be safer 
for you this way. Yggdrasil Prime out.

Thus, Botanica sent a message on planet for every member of the Iron 
Squand to meet up on the small station.

OOC: There. Anyone is welcome. Just know that they are a special ops 
unit and they're Maximal "assasins".
